data.title: Big Picture by Corey Voss
data.meta_description: Original Master MultiTracks, Charts, Patches, and instrument parts for rehearsal. View all products & resources available for "Big Picture" by Corey Voss
data.text:
Verse 1

I don't mind admitting that

A dream has run it's course

And I'm grieving

Oh I am grieving

I don't mind admitting that

I feel a little lost

It's a lonley season

Don't like this feeling

Chorus

I believe you're moving

In more ways than I can see

I believe you're in all things

And working perfectly

So I will trust you Jesus

Lord of all the little pieces

Of the big picture

Verse 2

I don't mind confessing

I don't have it all together

I've got questions

I don't mind confessing

I've got fears that make my prayers

A little angry

Yeah I've been angry

Chorus

I believe you're moving

In more ways than I can see

I believe you're in all things

And working perfectly

So I will trust you Jesus

Lord of all the little pieces

Of the big picture

Tag

It's the big picture

Bridge 1

It's here I find the wonder

And the beauty of Your grace

I watch the hand that orchestrates

The moments of my days

And things to seem to fall apart

In a thousand different ways

Bridge 2

Are really just

Falling into place

Even as the tears

Roll down my face

Chorus

I believe You're moving

In more ways than I can see

I believe You're in all things

And working perfectly

I believe You're moving

In more ways than I can see

I believe You're in all things

And working perfectly

Refrain

So I will trust You Jesus

Lord of all the little pieces

Outro

Of the big picture
